title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct market research and gather user feedback to understand the needs and preferences of potential users.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for the AI-Powered Financial Adviser project. This will include the AI model (explicitly mentioning use of XAI for transparency and user trust, as well as a recommended AI framework such as TensorFlow or PyTorch), data pipelines (specifying Apache NiFi or Airflow), integration with financial data sources (discussing APIs like Yahoo Finance, Alpaca, or Robinhood), user interfaces (outlining a frontend stack such as React + Redux for web or Flutter for mobile platforms), deployment infrastructure (using cloud providers like AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure and specifying containerization with Docker and Kubernetes), ensuring scalability, security, and performance requirements are met. Provide a detailed design document for review, addressing potential improvements, compliance analysis during the design phase, and a preliminary risk assessment. Include plans for testing, documentation, and consider conducting code reviews to ensure quality. If possible, suggest a timeline for each stage of the project. Update this task once the design document is ready for review.

title: AI Model Development
description: Research and develop the AI model for financial analysis and advice generation.

title: Data Pipeline and Integration
description: Develop data pipelines to ingest and process financial data from various sources, and integrate with the AI model.

title: User Interface Design for AI-Powered Financial Adviser (Revised)
description: Revised design proposal for the user interface of the financial advice platform. This includes user onboarding, profile management, advice presentation, and data visualization components. The updated design emphasizes simplicity, accessibility, responsiveness across various devices, a user-centric approach based on UX research insights, interactive elements, personalized experiences, seamless integration with the system architecture, adherence to security guidelines, collaboration with backend developers during implementation for smooth data flow and efficient performance. It is suggested that the design be further refined considering the feedback from the frontend-developer and the technical-writer during the development phase.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures and ensure compliance with relevant regulations, such as data privacy and financial regulations.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans and strategies for the AI model, data pipelines, and user interface. Conduct thorough testing and quality assurance.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure and implement DevOps practices for continuous integration, delivery, and monitoring.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the platform, including user guides, API documentation, and developer resources. Establish user support channels.
